channel.title: Data Validation and ETL With Glue :: AWS System Manager
channel.description: PART A: Create Glue Crawler for initial full load data Navigate to the AWS Glue Console On the AWS Glue menu, under ‘Data Catalog’, select Crawlers. Click Create crawler. Enter glue-lab-crawler as the crawler name for initial data load. Optionally, enter the description. This should also be descriptive and easily recognized and Click Next.
